bzh.plealog.bioinfo.api.data.sequence

Interface DRulerModel

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DRulerModelImplem, DSegmentedRulerModel, EmptyRulerModel

    public interface DRulerModel
    This interface defines a ruler model. It is intended to convert ruler coordinates into sequence coordinates.
    Author:
    Patrick G. Durand

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getIncrement()
      Returns the ruler increment.
      int getRulerPos(int seqPos)
      Given a position in the sequence coordinate system, returns the corresponding position within the ruler.
      int getSeqPos(int idx)
      Given a position on the ruler, returns the corresponding position within a sequence.
      int getStartPos()
      Returns the starting position of this ruler.
      int size()
      Returns the size of this ruler.

    • Method Detail
